title: Ep. 16. Murder on the Rockport Limited - Chapter Seven
description: In the final chapter in the Rockport Limited story arc, our heroes have little time to stop their runaway train from colliding with Neverwinter, potentially ruining some other group's D&D session. Magnus takes a tumble. Merle channels Gary Sinise. Taako does some pretty dope magical stuff.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
